content: Measurement is key Charles Chu Thanks for the RescueTime tip. I have not formally measured my computer time yet. Frankly, I am a bit nervous to see the results. I have made a great deal of progress on hard/fast policies (I don’t use Facebook at all, for instance). However, I worry about how I am doing within the places I am supposed to be an efficient actor (Trello, Medium, Github, Gmail, etc.). I will also employ the pen and paper route as you mentioned. My non-computer time is likely where more of the inefficiency and waste lives. Thanks!
